Will have a proper look later, and I don't know my blackguard from my elbow, but a couple of things occur at first glance. First: improved evasion and defensive roll but no epic dodge? Have to go out now, but I'll have more detailed analysis on return.

Cheers

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Bugger, I forgot about the 8d6 needed for imp sneak (thus BG25). Still, is one extra d6 of sneak damage worth losing 1AB and AC for? Bearing in mind many bosses are sneak/crit-resistant anyway. And let's not forget the -2AB that comes from d-wielding - however many feats you take in it - so your maxed AB dualling kamas becomes 40/37/34/31/28 etc (ignoring the dip from FoB), and that's with small amounts of damage per hit, should they land. Certainly sneaks help against mobs, but against bosses? I'm less confident. The principle I'm working from is one of "If I can't hit them often or hard, they shouldn't be able to hit me." Epic Dodge becomes your best friend here (and later bosses are more likely to have true seeing, so HiPS is less useful), but before level 27 you're very vulnerable.

A lot will depend upon how you play: I'm just raising a few concerns.

Cheers

EDIT: Sorry, but I don't like the "hanging chad" of 13 strength. We should be able to do better with that. Assuming we stay as is, that is.

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
I know that feeling too, when you get things almost right, but still think there must be some way to polish it and make it perfect, and you just can't find out how to piece things together.

As for a 4-sneak-attacks-in-the-first-flurry build, you need BAB 16 or better, monk levels for monk attack progression and flurry of blows, ITWF in Kamas, no armor, a SA class and some way to get your character hasted.
You have made a fine BG dex build here!
My way of doing it was was quite different from yours. I have a Monk3/ Fighter8/ Assassin 29 build with BAB 16, so no SD and no ED. But Assassin can get very high dex from epic bonus feats, and an undispellable concealment from Improved invisibility, and that compensates to some degree for the lack of ED.
You can also do the same thing without BAB 16 with cleric/ monk/ assassin and travel domain when you cast DP and Haste to max the # of attacks.

posts.content: I have done this with Rogue 19 / Monk 11 / Fighter 10 with ED and using KD/IKD to get sneaks. You can keep Monk and Fighter even to avoid EXP penalty, and you aren't stuck being evil, although that is still an option.
